text:
Raskolnikov couldn't hold back his laughter. “You’ve got pomade in your hair! 😂 Bend down!” 

“Shut up!” Razumihin shot back, clearly annoyed. 

Raskolnikov just laughed harder. They walked into Porfiry Petrovitch’s flat, still chuckling as they entered. 

“Keep it down, or I swear I’ll knock you out!” Razumihin whispered angrily, grabbing Raskolnikov by the shoulder.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov and Razumihin enter Porfiry Petrovitch's flat while laughing, highlighting their contrasting emotions.
